title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4621.4 - Surrender of chips
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4621.4 - Surrender of chips

State Regulations

All games of chance currency in the form of chips is to
be surrendered and redeemed for cash or merchandise either during or at the end
of the license period. In the case of merchandise wheels, all prizes are to be
in the form of merchandise and shall be awarded after each spin of the wheel or
wheels where a winner has been determined. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4621.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
